comments: Fournier (DET) swipes his hand down and makes contact with Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) left arm during his upward shooting motion, which affects his driving shot attempt in the paint.
Fournier (DET) cleanly dislodges the ball from Jackson Jr. (MEM), and any ensuing arm contact after the dislodge is considered incidental.
Clarke (MEM) and Wiseman (DET) briefly engage as they position themselves for the rebound, and the contact is marginal.
Clarke (MEM) firms up in Fournier's (DET) path and does not deliver any illegal contact when setting the pick.
Stevens (MEM) establishes himself in Fournier's (DET) path and marginal contact occurs as Stevens releases from the pick.
Ivey (DET) and Clarke (MEM) come together as they turn to pursue the rebound, and the contact is marginal.

Replay review of the out of bounds called on Goodwin (MEM) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. The ball last touches Metu (DET) before rolling out of bounds and possession is properly awarded to Memphis upon review. Since DET had called a timeout before MEM successfully challenged the call, DET was still charged the timeout.
Ivey (DET) steps slightly forward towards Kennard's (MEM) path, and marginal contact occurs as Kennard passes the ball.
Cunningham (DET) rests his hand on Clarke's (MEM) back and marginal contact occurs as Clarke mistimes his jump for the rebound.
Goodwin (MEM) cleanly dislodges the ball from Metu (DET).
Wiseman (DET) establishes himself in Goodwin's (MEM) path and does not deliver any illegal contact when setting the pick.
Ivey (DET) cleanly deflects the rebound away from Goodwin (MEM), and incidental contact occurs with Clarke (MEM) as Ivey returns to the floor.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Possession is awarded to the Grizzlies.  Goodwin (MEM) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds, and possession should have been awarded to the Pistons.
Jackson (MEM) is firming up over his right leg, and marginal lower body contact occurs with Metu (DET) during the screen.
Metu (DET) brings his left arm forward and marginal contact occurs with Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) arm as he spins into the lane.
Cunningham (DET) is bracing for the contact from Goodwin (MEM), and marginal contact occurs as he releases away from the contact.
Jackson (MEM) avoids making contact with Cunningham (DET) as he contests the shot attempt.
Contact between Clarke (MEM) and Wiseman (DET) occurs after the game clock expires.
